name: Demon Swing
description:
DEMON SWING
Use your bat to hit the demons fireballs to bounce them against themselves!
Take a a screenshot of your highscore and post in the comments!

The theme for the jam was GENRE; BUT NOT MECHANIC!
So we made a twin stick shooter, but without shooting!

Controls: WASD + mouse to aim, mouse button to swing
Should also work with joystick!

The standalone version gives the best expereience, but it is playable in the browser as well, but there are some problems with the music, so play the downloadable version for the best experience!

Made by Simon Engqvist & Johannes Fornaeus 
for GTMK JAM 2018
